content:
Does anybody have strong feelings against including image tokens in core? It makes sense to me to include them in core.
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3594

[D8] Expand image tokens to allow image styles (imagecache_token functionality) 路 Issue #3594 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need The functionality of Imagecache Token could be merged into the existing token functionality. (It looks like this functionality is merged into token in D8.) This module provi...
I'm for it as well ...Token is in core, and this always seems to come up from time to time. It would help people moving from D7.
